==Descriptions==
{{Description|The damp environment within the cave that lies hidden deep in the woods is especially suited for the growth of [[fungi]].<br />According to [[Amurta]], these fungi come in a great many varieties. However, few people save the [[Vanara]] — for whom mushroom-picking is a duty — will set foot there, given the large number of Fungi dwelling inside as well.|[[Expedition]] description}}

==Trivia==
===Etymology===
* {{Lang|''Chatraka''|sa=छत्राक}} is a Sanskrit word referring to "mushroom".<ref>https://www.wisdomlib.org/definition/chatraka</ref>
